Software Engineering Radio Interviews

Posted on May 18, 2008

Here are some interesting interviews I came across the other day on SE Radio, and thought I’d post them up here.

The first one is Joe Armstrong, from Programming Erlang fame, talking about Erlang [1].

The second one is Dick Gabriel on Lisp [2]. He’s famous for his involvement in CommonLisp, Emacs and as the founder of the Lisp company Lucid.
